what_you_do: Helps moms craft their stories and turn them into streams of income through community, curriculum, and coaching.
who_you_serve: Aspiring mom entrepreneurs who want to become inspiring messengers and digital entrepreneurs.
seeking: Partnerships with brands that are committed to supporting moms and families.
offering: Free online community in English and Spanish with a 12-step blueprint for credibility, visibility, and profitability; coaching, tools, tutorials, templates, tips, and techniques.
social_proof: Bestselling author, internationally acclaimed storyteller, award-winning mom entrepreneur, several-time TEDx Speaker, featured keynote speaker on prestigious stages around the world, 18+ years inspiring moms.
signature_programs: The Positive MOM Community, 12-step blueprint, Daily Date with Pain practice, B.O.L.D. goals framework, upcoming book on leading with validation.
business_focus: Empowering moms to break cycles, find peace, and feel whole by turning their stories into businesses.
service_provided: Community membership, coaching, blog, books, speaking, programs, storytelling curriculum
